login.title: Vetchium Agency
login.emailMinLength: Email must be at least {{min}} characters
login.emailMaxLength: Email must be at most {{max}} characters
login.domainMinLength: Domain must be at least {{min}} characters
login.domainMaxLength: Domain must be at most {{max}} characters
login.domainNotFound: Domain not found or not verified. Please check your domain or contact your administrator.
login.passwordMinLength: Password must be at least {{min}} characters
login.passwordMaxLength: Password must be at most {{max}} characters
login.accountInvalidState: Account is not in a valid state to login

tfa.title: Two-Factor Authentication
tfa.subtitle: A 6-digit code has been sent to your email
tfa.tokenMissing: TFA token missing. Please login again.
tfa.tokenExpired: TFA token expired or invalid. Please login again.
tfa.invalidCode: Invalid TFA code. Please try again.

signup.title: Create Agency Account
signup.domainMinLength: Domain must be at least {{min}} characters
signup.domainMaxLength: Domain must be at most {{max}} characters
signup.domainInvalid: Please enter a valid domain (e.g., example.com)
signup.domainPersonal: Personal email domains (Gmail, Yahoo, Outlook, etc.) are not allowed. Please use your agency domain.
signup.emailPrefixInvalid: Email can only contain letters, numbers, dots, underscores, percent, plus, and hyphens
signup.domainNotApproved: Your email domain is not approved for agency signup
signup.successMessage: We've sent DNS verification instructions to your email address. Please add the DNS TXT record to verify domain ownership.

signupComplete.title: Complete Your Signup
signupComplete.subtitle: Set up your account by verifying your DNS record and creating your password.
signupComplete.dnsInstructionsText: Add a TXT record at _vetchium-verify.{{domain}} with the value provided in your email.
signupComplete.dnsVerified: DNS record found! You can proceed with signup.
signupComplete.dnsNotFound: DNS record not found yet. Please ensure you've added the record and allow time for DNS propagation (may take up to 48 hours).
signupComplete.dnsPropagationWarning: Note: DNS changes can take up to 48 hours to propagate globally. If you've just added the record, you may need to wait and retry later.
signupComplete.passwordMinLength: Password must be at least {{min}} characters
signupComplete.passwordMaxLength: Password must be at most {{max}} characters
signupComplete.dnsRecordCheckbox: I have added the required DNS TXT record
signupComplete.dnsRecordCheckboxRequired: Please confirm you have added the DNS record
signupComplete.eulaCheckbox: I agree to the Terms of Service and End User License Agreement
signupComplete.eulaCheckboxRequired: You must agree to the EULA to continue
signupComplete.missingToken: Signup token is missing. Please use the link from your email.
signupComplete.tokenExpired: Your verification link has expired. Please sign up again.
signupComplete.dnsNotVerified: DNS verification failed. Please ensure you have added the TXT record and allow time for propagation. You may need to retry later.
signupComplete.networkError: Network error. Please try again later.

domain.title: டொமைன் சரிபார்ப்பு
domain.instructionsText: {{domain}}-க்கான உங்கள் DNS கட்டமைப்பில் TXT பதிவைச் சேர்க்கவும்:
domain.alreadyClaimed: இந்த டொமைன் ஏற்கனவே வேறொரு நிறுவனத்தால் கோரப்பட்டுள்ளது
domain.verificationPending: சரிபார்ப்பு சோதனை முடிந்தது. DNS பதிவு இன்னும் கிடைக்கவில்லை.
domain.rateLimited: சரிபார்ப்பு சமீபத்தில் கோரப்பட்டது. மீண்டும் கோருவதற்கு முன் காத்திருக்கவும்.

dashboard.title: வரவேற்கிறோம், முகவர் நிறுவனம்
dashboard.subtitle: நீங்கள் வெட்சியம் முகவர் நிறுவன போர்டலில் வெற்றிகரமாக உள்நுழைந்துள்ளீர்கள்.

alreadyLoggedIn.title: நீங்கள் ஏற்கனவே உள்நுழைந்துள்ளீர்கள்
alreadyLoggedIn.message: நீங்கள் ஏற்கனவே உள்நுழைந்துள்ளீர்கள். வேறு கணக்கில் உள்நுழைவதற்கு முன் வெளியேறவும்.
